title: Why should you duo with me? This is why :D
body: Hi! My name is Marla & I've been Gold season 3/4 & looking to climb back to that and into Plat this season :D I'm looking for a duo that prefers top/jungle/adc. Preferably Gold or higher last season, smurfs are always welcome! I am a mid laner :3 I will also fill any other role since I have been apart of this community since season 2 I have plenty of experience :3 I have Skype, Teamspeak, & Raidcall! If you are interested stop by my stream today and let me know if you'd like to duo!

replies.body: im a girl too add me everyone

I'll duo if you stop spamming.

I'd be able to duo with you if you want. Currently gold 5. My previous duo and myself did not have very good synergy so we lost 4 games in a row. Just add me if interested. I was gold 3 in season 3-4 and looking to get plat this year. I also play Mid, Jungle, and adc.
